dct_title_s: Map of the Sacramento Valley Railroad
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Oriented with north toward upper left.
Bar scale on map given in "feet."
Shows topography, drainage, city plans, land ownership, ranchos, mining districts.
Appears in Judah's Sacramento Valley Railroad Company. Report of the Chief Engineer on the preliminary surveys ... , San Francisco: B. F. Butler's Lith., 1854.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Warren Heckrotte Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain.  There are no restrictions on use.  If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
